text: Dos Historias () is a compilation album by American singer Selena and Mexican singer Ana Barbara. The album peaked at number three on the US Latin Regional Mexican Albums chart. It also peaked at number 21 on the Top Latin Albums Chart on Billboard in 2006. == Track listings == # "Como La Flor" - (Selena) # "La Trampa" - (Ana Bárbara) # "Amor Prohibido" - (Selena) # "Lo Busque" - (Ana Bárbara) # "Fotos y Recuerdos" - (Selena) # "Todo Lo Aprendi De Ti" - (Ana Bárbara) # "No Me Queda Mas" - (Selena) # "Bandido" - (Ana Bárbara) # "Tú Sólo Tú" - (Selena) # "Te Regalo La Lluvia" - (Ana Bárbara) # "Baila Esta Cumbia" - (Selena) # "Ya No Te Creo Nada" - (Ana Bárbara) # "Dreaming of You" - (Selena) # "Como Me Haces Falta" - (Ana Bárbara) == DVD == A special edition was released as well. It included a DVD of four music videos, two each, from Selena and Ana. #No Me Queda Mas (Selena) #Ya No Te Cero Nada (Ana Bárbara) #Dreaming Of You (Selena) #Bandido (Ana Bárbara) == References == Category:Selena albums Category:2006 albums Category:Compilation albums
title: Dos Historias
